function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and indoor air quality in apartment housing","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and respiratory issues among residents","Mitigation":"Ensure proper ventilation systems are installed and maintained, and prioritize indoor air quality management","Technologies":"High-efficiency particulate air (HEPA) filters, air purifiers, and mechanical ventilation systems","People":"Residents of apartment housing","Owner":"Architects, developers, and building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate spatial variety and privacy in apartment units","Impact":"Negative impact on mental health, well-being, and privacy of residents","Mitigation":"Design apartment units with a variety of spaces that offer privacy and refuge, and prioritize visual and thermal comfort","Technologies":"Modular furniture, soundproofing materials, and adaptable floor plans","People":"Residents of apartment housing","Owner":"Architects and designers"},{"Description":"Lack of proper separation for multi-functional spaces in apartment layouts","Impact":"Increased difficulty in maintaining separate and functional areas for various activities, leading to reduced productivity and potential conflicts","Mitigation":"Design apartment layouts with acoustic separation between rooms and flexible floor plans to support the changing role of the home","Technologies":"Soundproofing materials, partition walls, and adaptable furniture","People":"Residents of apartment housing","Owner":"Architects and developers"}]}
